entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
